com.cronos.im.logic
Class UserSessionEventListener

java.lang.Object
  com.cronos.im.logic.UserSessionEventListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.topcoder.chat.session.ChatSessionEventListener, java.util.EventListener
public class UserSessionEventListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.topcoder.chat.session.ChatSessionEventListener

This class implements ChatSessionEventListener. It is used to deal with the change event of user session. Here's its logic:

When a user is requested, post the Ask For Chat Message directly to the user.

When a user is added to session, and if the session status is OPEN, register a session message pool for the user. Post Presence Message of other users to this user, and post Presence Message of this user to other users.

When a user is removed from session, and if the session status is OPEN, unregister the session message pool for the user. Post Presence Message of this user to other users. For any session status, if the removed user is the last user of the session, change the session status to CLOSE.

Thread-safety: This class is immutable and thread safe.

Version:
1.0
Author:
justforplay, TCSDEVELOPER

UserSessionEventListener

public UserSessionEventListener(com.topcoder.chat.session.ChatSessionManager sessionManager,
                                com.cronos.im.messenger.Messenger messenger,
                                com.topcoder.chat.status.ChatSessionStatusTracker sessionStatusTracker,
                                long acknowledgeTime,
                                IMLogger logger)

Constructor create UserSessionEventListener with given parameters.

Parameters:
sessionManager - ChatSessionManager instance where this event listener belongs to. Can't be null.
messenger - message pool instance used to send messages. Can't be null.
sessionStatusTracker - chat session status tracker used to retrieve/change the session status. Can't be null.
acknowledgeTime - acknowledge time value in the AskForChatMessage.
logger - logger instance used to log the operations. Can be null.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the arguments except the logger is null, or the acknowledge is negative.

logger - logger instance used to log the operations. Can be null.
namespace - namespace used to load the acknowledge time value. Can't be null or empty.

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the arguments except the logger is null, or the namespace is empty.

userAdded

public void userAdded(com.topcoder.chat.session.ChatSession session,
                      long user)

This method deals with the event that a user is added to the chat session.

The user is registered to the message pool.

Presence message of this user is sent to the other users in this session.

Any exception except IllegalArgumentException are ignored.

Specified by:
userAdded in interface com.topcoder.chat.session.ChatSessionEventListener
Parameters:
session - ChatSession instance, null impossible
user - user id, any possible long value
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the session is null.

userRemoved

public void userRemoved(com.topcoder.chat.session.ChatSession session,
                        long user)

This method deals with the event that a user is removed from the chat session.

The user is un-registered from the message pool.

Not-presence message of this user is sent to the other users in this session.

Any exception except IllegalArgumentException are ignored.

Specified by:
userRemoved in interface com.topcoder.chat.session.ChatSessionEventListener
Parameters:
session - ChatSession instance, null impossible
user - user id, any possible long value
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the session is null.
